package.name: Image_Transform
package.summary: Provides a standard interface to manipulate images using different libraries
package.description:
This package was written to provide a simpler and cross-library interface to doing image transformations and manipulations. It provides :
* support for GD, ImageMagick, Imagick and NetPBM * files related functions * addText * Scale (by length, percentage, maximum X/Y) * Resize * Rotate (custom angle) * Crop * Mirror (Most drivers) * Flip (Most drivers) * Add border (soon) * Add shadow (soon)

release.notes: - #6011, call to imagick_crop is using incorrect parameters (gauthierm) - #6452, add a resize example (msaraujo at php dot net) - #599, parameter $quality in method save() not recognized in some drivers

Fixes quite a lot of problems, but still far from stable. GD driver should be much better. ImageMagick is the best driver, especially to deal with transparent and alpha-channel images. Due to the size of the images, the tests are not packaged, use CVS instead.
Second public release, hopefully much more stable. API nearly fixed. NOT NECESSARILY COMPATIBLE WITH 0.1 - be warned!
